result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Roberta A. Bateman

records.addlTxt:
3:44 p.m.
Clerk Micki.
INCLUDES 20CM823 and 22CM364

State appears by ADA Sidney Brubacher; Defendant appears in person, with Attorney Heather Roehr;

Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights filed. VRCW.
COURT advises defendant of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & questions defendant to understanding.

State moves to: 
20CM823
AMEND COUNT 1: 940.19(1) Battery, PTAC, Repeater to 940.19(1) Battery, PTAC. Delete Repeater enhancer.
COUNT 2: Disorderly Conduct, Repeater, PTAC >> DRI. 
22CM364
COUNT 1: Bail Jumping - Misdemeanor, Repeater >> DRI. 

COURT GRANTS.

PLEA to: 
20CM823
AMENDED COUNT 1: Battery, PTAC >> NO CONTEST. 

COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & voluntary made, a factual basis & defendant guilty.

COURT ORDERS: 15 days MCJ with 15 days credit for time served; DNA sample and surcharge; and CC. 

Adj: 3:53 p.m.
Plea hearing on October 5, 2022 at 03:40 pm.
Pre-trial conference on September 14, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Calendar call on August 9, 2022 at 08:05 am.
Final pre-trial on June 16, 2022 at 01:45 pm.
ATTIC:  Intake Report - Pretrial Services Program

records.addlTxt: INCLUDES 20CM823, 22CM364: No contact with victim(s): Marthon Copunty Public Library - Wausau Branch. Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.  Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol.   Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (3) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.

Clerk: Heather. 
Case called: 3:22 p.m.
INCLUDES: 20CM823, 22CM364. 
State appears by ADA Alex Lech for ADA Sidney Brubacher.  Defendant appears from MCJ via Zoom, with Atty Heather Roehr, in person.

Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.

- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol.  
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 3 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.
